# Graph Modification {#modification}

```{r load-igraph-library-00, include=FALSE}
x <- c("igraph", "tibble", "stringr", "kableExtra", "RColorBrewer", "viridis")
lapply(x, require, character.only = T, quietly = T)
```

## Load a plot

```{r}
g1 <- make_graph("house")
E(g1)
V(g1)
plot(g1)
g1[]
plot(g1,
     vertex.size = 30,
     vertex.color = 1)
g1 <- add_vertices(graph = g1, nv = 1, attr = list(color = 2))
plot(g1)
g1 <- add_edges(graph = g1, edges= c(2,6, 4,6, 3,6), attr = list(color = 3))
plot(g1)

V(g1)$color = 2
plot(g1)
```
